typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		columns as string[],
		data as string[][]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> GetTickers
GetTickers alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
